Class OptionalNamableElement<ONE extends OptionalNamableElement<ONE>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.entity.Entity<E>
      • ch.nolix.element.core.Element<MU>
        • ch.nolix.element.core.MutableElement<ONE>
          • ch.nolix.element.bases.OptionalNamableElement<ONE>
  • Type Parameters:
    ONE - The type of an optional namable element.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IController, Castable, IFluentObject<ONE>, ISmartObject<ONE>, Listable<ONE>, TypeRequestable, Namable<ONE>, Named, OptionalNamable<ONE>, Resettable<ONE>, Specifiable<ONE>, Specified
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfigurableElement, Configuration

    public abstract class OptionalNamableElement<ONE extends OptionalNamableElement<ONE>>
extends MutableElement<ONE>
implements OptionalNamable<ONE>
    An optional namable element is an element that can have a name.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
